description.plain:
In 2016 Jack Garratt released his debut album ‘Phase’ on Island Records.  The multi-instrumentalist wrote, arranged and performed every track. In the same year Garratt was awarded a number of prestigious British music accolades and embarked on a world tour, ending in two sold out nights at London’s Hammersmith Apollo in 2017.

In the immediate aftermath Garratt wrote and swiftly discarded a draft of album two, before setting up in the studio with co-producers James Flannigan and Jacknife Lee – embarking on what would become his sophomore album ‘Love, Death & Dancing’. In February 2020 Vol. 1 of the album (tracks 1 – 3) was unleashed into the world with lead single ‘Time’ receiving its first play as Annie Mac’s Hottest Record In The World on BBC Radio 1. Jack has described ‘Love, Death & Dancing’ as, “dance music for people who don’t want to go out,” and detailed how it chronicles his battle with depression, anxiety, and self-doubt.

The new album was released on June 12, 2020.

body.plain:
In 2016 Jack Garratt released his debut album ‘Phase’ on Island Records.  The multi-instrumentalist wrote, arranged and performed every track. In the same year Garratt was awarded a number of prestigious British music accolades and embarked on a world tour, ending in two sold out nights at London’s Hammersmith Apollo in 2017.

In the immediate aftermath Garratt wrote and swiftly discarded a draft of album two, before setting up in the studio with co-producers James Flannigan and Jacknife Lee – embarking on what would become his sophomore album ‘Love, Death & Dancing’. In February 2020 Vol. 1 of the album (tracks 1 – 3) was unleashed into the world with lead single ‘Time’ receiving its first play as Annie Mac’s Hottest Record In The World on BBC Radio 1. Jack has described ‘Love, Death & Dancing’ as, “dance music for people who don’t want to go out,” and detailed how it chronicles his battle with depression, anxiety, and self-doubt.

The new album was released on June 12, 2020.

songs.title: Weathered

description.plain:
‘Weathered’ is Garratt’s latest song to be released, hitting the UK on the 6th of July. Much anticipated, the song is expected to hit the charts in a crazy way.

The song questions growing old, and Garratt’s lyrics clearly show that he never wants to grow old, as he doesn’t want to forget the amazing memories he currently has. While we are unsure what he asks to stay with him, we do know that he’s begging for eternal youth.

A mixture of acoustics, deep vocals and consistent bass make this song beautifully crafted.

songs.embed_content: Read “Weathered” by Jack Garratt on Genius

songs.lyrics:
13 ContributorsWeathered Lyrics[Verse 1]
When I grow old, I'll drink and smoke
Like I did when youth stayed, youth stayed
'Til the second round
When I grow old, the sun will cope
Shine on every youth stain, youth stain
Never settling down

[Chorus]
And no wonder I keep you close
You're the water to quench my throat
And if I never let you go
Will you keep me young
Keep me young

[Verse 2]
When I grow old, my weathered soul
And memories recluse, elusive
Help me take them out
So keep me young and call my bluffs
And help me out when you say, you say
There's no room for doubt

[Chorus 2]
Say I'm stronger and keep me close
And be the water and test my cold
And if I never let you go
Will you keep me young
Keep me young
You might also like[Bridge]
Oh, when my heart stops beating
And my blood turns cold
And oh, when my heart stops beating
And my breath won't flow
And oh, when my heart stops beating
When you go, oh no, I know

[Bridge]
Oh, when my heart stops beating
And my blood turns cold
And oh, when my heart stops beating
And my breath won't flow
And oh, when my heart stops beating
When you go, I'll know I'm...

[Outro]
When I grow old, I'll drink and smoke
But just as long as you stay, you stay
I found a way out12Embed

songs.lyrics:
6 ContributorsBreathe Life Lyrics[Verse 1]
I wouldn't compliment myself for what I've become
Tell her I owe it to her
Tell her I owe it to her
I wouldn't praise myself for every good thing I've done
Tell her I owe it to her
Tell her I owe it to her

[Pre-Chorus 1]
Tell her I owe it to every heartbeat
Tell her I owe it to every exhale
Tell her I owe it to, owe it to her
Hands upon my chest

[Chorus]
Oh, won't you breathe life into these dead lungs I keep under my coat
And keep life warm against the cold night as our bodies grow old

[Verse 2]
I know when to give up and I know when to breathe
Believe me, I owe it to her
Tell her I owe it to her

[Pre-Chorus 2]
Tell her I owe it to every heartbeat
Tell her I owe it to every inhale
Tell her I owe it to, owe it to her
Hands upon my chest
You might also like[Chorus]
Oh, won't you breathe life into these dead lungs I keep under my coat
And keep life warm against the cold night as our bodies grow old
Oh, won't you breathe life into these dead lungs I keep under my coat
And keep life warm against the cold night as our bodies grow old

[Bridge]
Take my silence as a warning
I will not deter your mourning

[Chorus]
Oh, won't you breathe life into these dead lungs I keep under my coat, ooh
And keep life warm against the cold night as our bodies grow old, ooh
Oh, won't you breathe life into these dead lungs I keep under my coat, ooh
And keep life warm against the cold night as our bodies grow old, ooh

Oh, won't you breathe life into these dead lungs I keep under my coat, ooh
And keep life warm against the cold night as our bodies grow old, ooh
Oh, won't you breathe life into these dead lungs I keep under my coat, ooh
And keep life warm against the cold night as our bodies grow old, ooh2Embed

songs.title: Surprise Yourself

description.plain:
“Surprise Yourself” is a track from Jack Garratt’s debut album, Phase.

In the making of the music video for “Surprise Yourself”, Jack explains that

I wrote [“Surprise Yourself”] for a very special person in my life, and she’d had the worst day, [where] you feel like the world is against you, or the universe has decided that you suck. I wanted to remind her that wasn’t the case, that we all still have the confidence, we all still have the ability to encourage ourselves to be courageous.

“Surprise Yourself” is also included in the official soundtrack for the 2016 film, Me Before You.

songs.embed_content: Read “Surprise Yourself” by Jack Garratt on Genius

songs.lyrics:
28 ContributorsTranslationsPortuguêsSurprise Yourself Lyrics[Verse 1]
Speak and open up your mind
It's something you should do all the time
Keep exploring, seek and find
You know you might surprise yourself
Talk without a taint to hold
The doubts that should embrace your heart
The calm and chaos of your soul
You know you might surprise yourself

[Verse 2]
Take a pen and write this down
Draw something that can't be found
And learn to walk again somehow
You know you might surprise yourself

[Verse 3]
Lover, if you only knew
The times that train has fooled me too
And tears me from a place I know
It helps me to surprise myself
You know you can surprise yourself
So let go and surprise yourselfYou might also like8Embed
